title: Here and there in the Home Land. England, Scotland and Ireland as seen by a Canadian. ... Profusely illustrated
author: Haight, Canniff.
snippet: The hills of Arrochar, the summit of Goatfell, Greenock,Port Glasgow, the Upper Firth, Kilpatrick Hills, the mazesof the Clyde and the town of Paisley lie around us, andpresent a variety of scenery such as is rarely met with,and full of interest and beauty.
